contextId.information: AT: "Ah, enemies have searched Esau; they have looked for his hidden treasure." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: How Esau has been ransacked, and his hidden treasures sought out

contextId.information: AT: "so that there will be no more people in the mountains of Esau because enemies killed them." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: so that every man may be cut off from the mountain of Esau by slaughter

contextId.information: "I will do to you the same things that you did to others." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: As you have done, it will be done to you
